"Ship Infiltration: Large Enemy Battlesh:
"We've detected a large enemy ship just
outside our normal alert range, which
may be attempting to summon a fleet.
Infiltrate this ship and prevent the fleet
from being summoned.
Your target is the ship's main reactor.
Bypass its defenses and destroy it.
――――――――――――――――――――
Defeat the enemy in the final area.
Quest ends after 15 player deaths."

"Quest Objective [Head to the final area!]

If players are defeated a total of 15 times, the quest will end"
"Use a fighter to board the enemy battleship, then head for the main reactor while avoiding being caught by its security systems."
"Once the reactor is destroyed, get out of there immediately. Please be careful!"
